mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (seller_id, title, description, price, status, apartment_name, si_do, si_gun_gu, eup_myeon_dong) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, 'FOR_SALE', #{apartmentName}, #{siDo}, #{siGunGu}, #{eupMyeonDong})
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.seller_id as sellerId, p.title, p.description, p.price, p.status, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, p.apartment_name as apartmentName, p.si_do as siDo, p.si_gun_gu as siGunGu, p.eup_myeon_dong as eupMyeonDong, u.building_dong as buildingDong, u.building_ho as buildingHo FROM products p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.seller_id = u.user_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT image_url FROM product_images WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY image_id
